input_text.Response A: This brand new AC Compressor with AC repair kit is suited for various Lexus ES300 models from 1994 through 1999. The Kit includes 5 parts - Brand new AC compressor with clutch, new accumulator/receiver drier / desiccant, new expansion device, vehicle specific set of o-rings and bottle of compressor oil and has been engineered for superior durability.
